Contributor: Ilikolocki, J. P., artist.; McGraw-Hill Company, publisher.;
Description: Illustration shows a women in a drape and liberty crown like the Statue of Liberty, saying "If ye break faith with them who die, they will not sleep, tho poppies grow in Flanders fields."
